title: @Riot
body:
I post this every week or so, as support just isn't responding to me :(

What is happening with the refer-a-friend rewards we earned in NA?

Last thing support said was "We have forwarded your info to the team handling this". That was weeks ago. I've replied to support and heard nothing back - the ticket is still open. getting so sick of being ignored :( can I just get a "we are on it" from someone?

Surely I'm not the only person in this position on the server?? No one ever really replies to my posts either, so maybe i am the only person on the server waiting for the new rewards. Yay. love being ignored :(

replies.body:
Hey sweetie,

First off sorry you feel so ignored, hope I can help.

I'm not sure if you heard but Riot introduced a new and easier "Bring-A-Mate" Program.
Details can be found here;
http://rewards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

Hope this helps,
Skyprus

When they brought in the new program, they said they would honor the past progress in other programs. I want that past progress from when we were in NA honored. Or at least for someone to get back to me...
Did you transfer on this very account?

Sure did :)

There is zero dodginess/confusion/complication. It should be as easy as just doing it  - and if it isn't, why not update me :(

Boourns.
